text: 'iilaa man rahim rabuk faminuu bih watabaeuu rslh, fa'iinahum la yakhtalifun fi tawhid allah wama ja'at bih alrusul min eind allh, waqad aiqtadat hkmth subhanah wteala 'anah khalaqhm mkhtlfyn: fariq shqy wafariq seyd, wakulu mysr lamaa khuliq lh. wbhdha yatahaqaq waead rabik fi qdayh wqdrh: 'anah subhanah symla jahanam min aljini wal'iins aladhin atabaeuu 'iiblis wjndh walam yahtaduu ll'iyman
